resources.string: “Student Assistant Android App” is an creation for assisting the college stdents with the on-gong college curriculam related to Academics, College events,Exam schedules, Regular subject Time table and much more.

Students will get regular updates and timely alert notifications in case of immediate reschedule of timetable or suspension of scheduled class. Student Assistant is an idea to help students with the previous year question papers, topic wise notes and Assignment related details.
We have provided an Auto Silent(DND) option which will automatically silent student’s cell phones in case they forget to do so during college hours.
To check your examination result click on the button given below it will send you to the Lucknow University Website Examination Result Page
